entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
